column5: Looking for a picnic table kit, like a box of 2X4 already cut with instructions to build a picnic table.  I have searched Home Depot, Rona, Canadian Tire, and have come up empty.  Not looking for plans to build one, if its not already cut, its going to be crooked lol...  Burt
just one today at the home depot on laird and eglington.....i think it was around 119.00....looked pretty decent   good luck
Cool, I will have to check out the local HD in person, I was checking the websites for one and came up empty.  Thanks for the info!  Burt
Any Home Depot or Rona I've seen has them. Rona was $79 i think.
Let me know if you can't find a kit. Perhaps the construction teacher at your local high school would be interested in building you one (Highland the good). Jim
i see them all the time in parks
...and that's why they're always chained to something...

Hey Burtie, Turkstra's in Dundas has your picnic table kits in. Our wood shop guy just bought six kits for 75$ each (says you can't buy the wood for that money). and the kits is fantastic. Is that close enough for you? Jim
